trim¶

Created on Thu Sep 14 13:22:29 2017

@author: js22g12

class trimMixin¶

Bases: object

docstring

planarTrim(height, plane='z')¶

Trim the vertices according to a flat plane

Parameters:
  • height (float) – Trim height, values above this will be deleted
  • plane (str: 'x', 'y' or 'z') – plane for slicing
